languages.text: "Пустив их в другие ульи, мы дали им распространиться, словно эпидемии. Теперь ячейки их культа есть повсюду".
"By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."
languages.original_text: "Пустив их в другие ульи, мы дали им распространиться, словно эпидемии. Теперь ячейки их культа есть повсюду".

traits.locale_text: "By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread around, like a pandemic. Now the cells of their cult are everywhere."
"By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread around, like a pandemic. Now the cells of their cult are everywhere."
"By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."
"By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like a pandemic. Now the cells of their cult are everywhere."
"By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like a pandemic. Now the cells of their cult are everywhere."
"By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."
"By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."
"By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."

languages.text: “是我们纵容它们渗透到其他巢都，让这些异端分子像大规模传染病一样疯狂传播。如今，他们的邪教组织无处不在。”
languages.original_text: "By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."

traits.locale_text: “是我们纵容它们渗透到其他巢都，让这些异端分子像大规模传染病一样疯狂传播。如今，他们的邪教组织无处不在。”
“是我们纵容它们渗透到其他巢都，让这些异端分子像流行病一样疯狂传播。如今，他们的邪教组织无处不在。”

languages.text: «Al permitir que se infiltraran en las otras colmenas, dejamos que se extendieran como una pandemia. Ahora las células de su culto están por todas partes».
languages.original_text: "By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."

traits.locale_text: «Al permitir que se infiltraran en las otras colmenas, dejamos que se extendieran como una pandemia. Ahora las células de su culto están por todas partes».

languages.text: 「奴らを他のハイヴに潜入させ、パンデミックのように広げてしまった。奴らのカルトのセルは至る所に散在している」
languages.original_text: "By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らを他のハイヴに潜入させ、パンデミックのように広げてしまった。奴らの魔女団のセルは至る所に散在している」
「奴らを他のハイヴに潜入させ、パンデミックのように広げてしまった。奴らの魔女団のセルは至る所に散在している」

languages.text: « En leur permettant d'infiltrer les autres ruches, nous les avons laissés se répandre comme la peste. Désormais, on trouve des cellules de leur culte partout. »
languages.original_text: "By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."

traits.locale_text: « En leur permettant d'infiltrer les autres ruches, nous les avons laissés se répandre comme la peste. Désormais, on trouve des cellules de leur culte partout. »

languages.text: "Als wir zuließen, dass sie die anderen Makropolen infiltrieren, konnten sie sich wie eine Epidemie ausbreiten. Jetzt hat ihr Kult überall Zellen."
languages.original_text: "By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."

traits.locale_text: "Als wir zuließen, dass sie die anderen Makropolen infiltrieren, konnten sie sich wie eine Epidemie ausbreiten. Jetzt hat ihr Kult überall Zellen."
"Wir haben ihnen gestattet, die anderen Makropolen zu infiltrieren und sich dadurch wie eine Pandemie zu verbreiten. Nun sind die Zellen ihres Kults überall."

languages.text: "Diğer kovanlara sızmalarına müsaade ederek salgın gibi yayılmalarına olanak tanıdık. Şimdiyse tarikatlarının hücreleri her yerde."
languages.original_text: "By letting them infiltrate the other hives, we allowed them to spread like an epidemic. Now their cult has cells everywhere."

traits.locale_text: "Diğer kovanlara sızmalarına müsaade ederek salgın gibi yayılmalarına olanak tanıdık. Şimdiyse tarikatlarının hücreleri her yerde."
